channel.title: Set up 0wners
channel.description: Well Hello guys =D I'm Having a little problem's here :( me and my friend are the owners of the server, but I've changed the old owners name by ours in "command java" and didn't work =o can someone help ? (a) =P sorry about my bad english because I'm portuguese. xD

item.title: Set up 0wners
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

you need rep 15 to modify peoples rep…(you have 10)

To rep just look at his name and under the stars is a rep++ button and a rep-- button…

Read full topic

item.title: Set up 0wners
item.dc:creator: @lil-rmj lil-rmj
item.description:
@lil-rmj wrote:

put this in a text file and save as coompile.bat in your server folder.

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

then run it if it says path cannot be found try this one instead

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
rep if i helped :L

Read full topic

item.title: Set up 0wners
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Well I don’t know about command.java (mine was almost empty) but you could either just make a command that you can say when ever you want to.
Like if you say that command this happens:

if(player.rights =3){ if(player.getUsername().equals("YOUR NAME")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ffffff>[What-ever-you-want-scape OWNER]"+player.getUsername()+": "has come online.); }else if(player.getUsername().equals("YOUR FRIENDS NAME")) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=ffffff>[What-ever-you-want-scape OWNER]"+player.getUsername()+": "has come online.); } }
Or you can check this when a player logs in, but I don’t know where you would find that.
Note: some of this code may be wrong because, like I said, I don’t know too much about 508’s.

Read full topic
